message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I really think that's a fair price for the product.
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but that's as low as I can go.

I understand that you're close to your target, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125, but I'll throw in a small bonus, which will make it a great deal for you. Let me think for a moment... Ah, yes! I'll throw in a 10% discount on the product. That would bring the price down to $112.50. What do you think?

I appreciate the bonus, but I'm still not willing to go above $110. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but no higher. I'm getting a bit concerned that I might be able to find a better deal elsewhere.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at your target price of $110, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal too. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110, but I'll throw in a small additional bonus, which will make it a great deal for both of us. Let me think for a moment... Ah, yes! I'll throw in a 5% discount on the product, which will bring the price down to $104.50. What do you think?
